I've seen all 3 seasons (reruns anyway) and all the bots I remember 
had BEAST MODES! Are you thinking of another series or did they just 
cut him out for the reruns?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Vincent Price" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Dewboy, I know you don't have much knowledge of Beast wars, so 
I'll tell you this. There's a Jetstorm is Beast Wars, as well as in 
G1. Choke on that...
